parameters.command:
=bash -lc '
dir="/home/node/processing/{{ $json.CHANNEL_NAME }}/DAY_SUMMARY"
shopt -s nullglob
printf "["
first=1
for f in "$dir"/*.mp4; do
  bn="$(basename -- "$f")"
  ext="${bn##*.}"
  mime="$(file --mime-type -b "$f" 2>/dev/null || echo application/octet-stream)"
  size="$(stat -c%s "$f")"
  size_h="$(numfmt --to=iec --suffix=B "$size" 2>/dev/null || echo "$size")"
  mtime="$(stat -c%y "$f" 2>/dev/null || echo "-")"
  btime="$(stat -c%w "$f" 2>/dev/null || echo "-")"  # pode ser "-" em alguns FS
  kind="$(stat -c%F "$f" 2>/dev/null || echo "file")"

  if [ $first -eq 0 ]; then printf ","; fi
  first=0

  printf "{"
  printf "\"fileName\":%q,"   "$bn"
  printf "\"directory\":%q,"  "$(dirname -- "$f")"
  printf "\"fileExtension\":%q," "$ext"
  printf "\"mimeType\":%q,"   "$mime"
  printf "\"fileSize\":%s,"   "$size"
  printf "\"fileSizeHuman\":%q," "$size_h"
  printf "\"modified\":%q,"   "$mtime"
  printf "\"created\":%q,"    "$btime"
  printf "\"kind\":%q"        "$kind"
  printf "}"
done
printf "]"
'

parameters.title: ={{ `#${$now.setZone('America/Sao_Paulo').setLocale('pt-BR').toFormat("dd 'de' LLLL yyyy")}: Resumo das principais notícias do dia.` }}

options.description: ={{ `Hoje, trago um resumo das principais notícias do dia ${ $now.setZone('America/Sao_Paulo').setLocale('pt-BR').toFormat("dd 'de' LLLL yyyy") }` }}!

value.MESSAGE: Vídeo RESUMO DIÁRIO de enviado com SUCESSO!
